title: Through conflict to negotiation
creator_credit: Peter Pearson, Bonnie Sherr Klein, John Kemeny, Barrie Howells and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Challenge for change”
A community action group in Rochester, New York, confronts the community’s largest employer on the issue of corporate responsibility and the employment of minority groups.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Pearson, Bonnie Sherr Klein, John Kemeny, Barrie Howells and National Film Board of Canada
